content.SUBTITLE: You have an idea and want to shoot for the stars
content.desc_fr:
First, contact us @... and let’s pitch 5 minutes with 10 minutes Q&A. We offer you the possibility to have a film of your 1st pitch.
You are idea is great, you are sure of that. Hummm… we propose you to test your Why… and build your path, step by step to your North Star during a 2-hours session. Be ready for your first Pivot!
content.desc_en:
First, contact us @... and let’s pitch 5 minutes with 10 minutes Q&A. We offer you the possibility to have a film of your 1st pitch.
You are idea is great, you are sure of that. Hummm… we propose you to test your Why… and build your path, step by step to your North Star during a 2-hours session. Be ready for your first Pivot!
